pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Framework of Cross-Validation // A framework of cross- validation for spectral data analysis that allows for automatic tuning of model parameters and for model evaluation. It is particularly useful for applications where intra-group heterogeneity is significant due to inter individual differences. S. Guo, T. Bocklitz, U. Neugebauer, J.Popp (2017) doi:10.1039/C7AY01363A.
